values.name: Addict
values.description: Whatever your fix is, you've GOT TO have it.

values.name: Adherent
values.description: Stay true to your goals/beliefs no matter what.

values.name: Adjudicator
values.description: Pronounce the solutions to others' problems.

values.name: Advisor
values.description: Your wise counsel is sought out.

values.name: Analyst
values.description: Collection and study of information brings understanding.

values.name: Architect
values.description: Creation is your passion.

values.name: Artisan
values.description: Hard work and dedication will get you there, wherever that is.

values.name: Artist
values.description: Inspire, challenge or provoke others with your works.

values.name: Aspirant
values.description: A master of none is better than a master of one.

values.name: Autocrat
values.description: Control freak.

values.name: Avant Garde
values.description: A fascination with the trendy and new.

values.name: Barbarian
values.description: Civilization is the crutch of the weak

values.name: Beast
values.description: Conquer all who oppose you, destroying them if possible.

values.name: Believer
values.description: You must convince others of the Truth only you know.

values.name: Bon Vivant
values.description: Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow we die.

values.name: Bravo
values.description: Cruelty and bullying are your good points.

values.name: Bumpkin
values.description: Solid and practical, common sense, and pragmatism.

values.name: Bureaucrat
values.description: Rules and laws weren't made to be broken, ever.

values.name: Caregiver
values.description: Actively caring or helping others.

values.name: Cavalier
values.description: The fearless hero.

values.name: Celebrant
values.description: Pursue excitement in all things.

values.name: Challenger
values.description: You exist to test the mettle of others, especially your so-called betters.

values.name: Child
values.description: Working through immaturity and innocence.

values.name: Churl
values.description: Manners are for wimps, wusses, and mama's boys.

values.name: Competitor
values.description: You must win everything to be happy.

values.name: Comrade
values.description: You value friendship above all other things.

values.name: Confidant
values.description: A good listener and keeper of secrets.

values.name: Conformist
values.description: You would rather follow a powerful figure than lead.

values.name: Conniver
values.description: You want something for nothing.

values.name: Courtier
values.description: The social butterfly.

values.name: Coward
values.description: The Coward fears himself above all.

values.name: Crafter
values.description: The urge to improve things burns strong within you.

values.name: Craven
values.description: Better a live coward than a dead hero.

values.name: Critic
values.description: You find imperfections in everything.

values.name: Crusader
values.description: All action must serve your goal and inspire others likewise.

values.name: Curmudgeon
values.description: Cynicism is the main means of operation.

values.name: Dandy
values.description: A social climber at heart, whatever it takes.

values.name: Darling
values.description: You are the apple of everyone's eye.

values.name: Defender
values.description: You stand guard over that for which you care.

values.name: Demagogue
values.description: Incite others to your side using their fears and prejudices.

values.name: Deviant
values.description: The status quo is for suckers.

values.name: Diplomat
values.description: There is always a compromise to be had.

values.name: Director
values.description: Order is the name of the game.

values.name: Dreamer
values.description: Focus on the loftiness of your goals, not their practicality.

values.name: Eccentric
values.description: Strange times call for strange behavior/attitudes.

values.name: Engine
values.description: Utterly implacable, nothing sways you from your goal.

values.name: Evangelist
values.description: Whatever it is you have faith in, you must spread the word.

values.name: Explorer
values.description: Seek new experiences and ideas.

values.name: Eye of the Storm
values.description: The thrill of chaos calls to you.

values.name: Fanatic
values.description: One cause, full support for it.

values.name: Fatalist
values.description: All things will go wrong.

values.name: Fiend
values.description: You inflict pain for no other reason than the enjoyment you get out of watching others suffer.

values.name: Fool
values.description: No matter the cause, as long as someone tells you what it is.

values.name: Fop
values.description: Appearance is everything.

values.name: Freak
values.description: Your mind is a seething realm of chaos that you can barely understand

values.name: Futurist
values.description: Revels in the magnificent unknown.

values.name: Gadfly
values.description: The watcher watching the watchmen, keeping the powers that be honest.

values.name: Gallant
values.description: A rogue to themselves, a jerk to most.

values.name: Grotesque
values.description: You love disgusting others and go out of your way to push their buttons.

values.name: Guru
values.description: Your enlightenment draws others to you.

values.name: Healer
values.description: Ease the pain and suffering of the afflicted.

values.name: Hedonist
values.description: The pursuit of pleasure is your reason for living.

values.name: Hermit
values.description: Reclusive and ascetic.

values.name: Hoarder
values.description: You have determined that you will never lack for anything.

values.name: Honest Abe
values.description: The simple things in life are best.

values.name: Humbug
values.description: Grumpy, sour, and just plain cranky, nothing ever satisfies you.

values.name: Ice heart
values.description: You are the Ice Queen, the detached and cold pragmatist.

values.name: Jester
values.description: In the school of life, you are the class clown.

values.name: Jobs worth
values.description: The routine is the only comfortable way to exist.

values.name: Judge
values.description: Brutal honesty results in improvements.

values.name: Knave
values.description: With a sparkle in your eye, you cajole, encourage, tempt, trick, and manipulate others into exploring their darkest desires.

values.name: Knight
values.description: You follow all the old codes of chivalry/bushido/whatever and seek to aid those in need.

values.name: Lackey
values.description: You are a servile minion, drawing strength from those you serve.

values.name: Loner
values.description: Company makes for uncomfortable situations.

values.name: Lurker
values.description: To not be noticed, and you slouch, slink, and creep out of the way.

values.name: Manipulator
values.description: It's fun to tweak the actions of others.

values.name: Martyr
values.description: The sacrifice of one is beneficial to others.

values.name: Masochist
values.description: It ain't good until it hurts.

values.name: Mastermind
values.description: You are the brilliant, if underestimated, architect of destruction.

values.name: Meddler
values.description: You know what's best for everyone.

values.name: Mediator
values.description: Balance is the best way.

values.name: Merchant
values.description: Everything and everyone is up for sale.

values.name: Minion
values.description: ou crave the attentions of beings more powerful than yourself.

values.name: Monger
values.description: You value only one thing, be it money, fame, power, etc.

values.name: Monster
values.description: knows she is a creature of darkness and acts like it.

values.name: Mystic
values.description: It's a strange world out there, and you're determined to find out more about it.

values.name: None Partisan
values.description: Avoid external preconceptions, judge things/people for yourself.

values.name: Obfuscater
values.description: One who buries their secrets.

values.name: Optimist
values.description: Life is good. Live it.

values.name: Orchid
values.description: Innocence, now faced with the harsh realities of the world.

values.name: Outcast
values.description: You are a loner, a drifter on the outskirts of society.

values.name: Outlaw
values.description: You take what you want from others without a moment's hesitation and guilt.

values.name: Outsider
values.description: rebel, with or without a cause.

values.name: Paladin
values.description: Nothing is too good or too low for your God.

values.name: Panderer
values.description: You love to see other people happy, regardless of yourself.

values.name: Pandora
values.description: You just can't seem to keep your box shut.

values.name: Paragon
values.description: Stick to your code to provide an example to the rest.

values.name: Paranoid
values.description: They actually are after you…

values.name: Peacock
values.description: You are the most attractive, smartest, best person in the world.

values.name: Pedagogue
values.description: Learning is what life is all about.

values.name: Penitent
values.description: There is no right to exist. It must be earned.

values.name: Perfectionist
values.description: Mistakes cannot be made.

values.name: Philanthropist
values.description: You have a highly defined sense of morality and always strive to do the 'right' thing.

values.name: Pishogue
values.description: You interpret reality very differently than everyone else, but in a benign fashion.

values.name: Plotter
values.description: Nothing can be done right without a plan.

values.name: Poltroon
values.description: Someone cannot shoot at a target they do not have.

values.name: Praise Seeker
values.description: The opinions of others drive existence.

values.name: Prankster
values.description: Jokes, pranks, and laughs. Loki would be proud.

values.name: Predator
values.description: You divide the world into those who hunt, and those who are hunted.

values.name: Provider
values.description: Your focus is your family's well-being.

values.name: Questor
values.description: The Questor seeks to find the one great answer that will make sense of the world.

values.name: Ragamuffin
values.description: Substance is all that matters

values.name: Rake
values.description: You are a greedy sensualist, a miser, a glutton, an obsessive collector, and a hoarder of experience.

values.name: Rational
values.description: Logic and reason above all else.

values.name: Rebel
values.description: The establishment is a joke.

values.name: Regent
values.description: Nobility in the purest sense, you are the ruler, the patriarch or matriarch.

values.name: Ringleader
values.description: You have your gang and you rule them with an iron fist.

values.name: Rogue
values.description: Only one thing matters to the Rogue: herself. To each his own.

values.name: Sadist
values.description: You like to push the boundaries other others and try to see how much they can take.

values.name: Sage
values.description: You are the advisor, the wise one, the teacher.

values.name: Saint
values.description: You feel the pain of those around you and strive to ease their suffering.

values.name: Savage
values.description: Back to nature, trash the rest.

values.name: Schismatic
values.description: Things fall apart. The center cannot hold. You are a destroyer of social institutions.

values.name: Seer
values.description: Someone has to plumb the mysteries of the world, for the good of others.

values.name: Soldier
values.description: Your firm resolve under pressure keeps the team together.

values.name: Sophist
values.description: One who teaches solely for self gain.

values.name: Squire
values.description: Servant and side kick, all in one.

values.name: Stoic
values.description: All hardships must be endured with calm.

values.name: Survivor
values.description: Perseverance is the only way to get ahead in life.

values.name: Sycophant
values.description: Let others do the hard work and live on praise for it.

values.name: Thrill Seeker
values.description: Take a chance on everything.

values.name: Traditionalist
values.description: The old ways are the best ways.

values.name: Trickster
values.description: Find the absurd in everything.

values.name: Troubadour
values.description: You walk in a fog of pink and lilac optimism.

values.name: Vigilante
values.description: Decide and dispense justice yourself.

values.name: Virtuoso
values.description: Seek to master one thing, be the best of the best.

values.name: Visionary
values.description: There is something more to life and this existence.

values.name: Wayfarer
values.description: The endless wanderer.
